snippet: The Writers Guild of America reported a 6 percent drop in total earnings from movie writing, to about $343 million. TV writing nudged up, to roughly $1 billion.
abstract: Earnings of movie writers continue to decline, while those of television writers increase slightly.
lead_paragraph: The Writers Guild of America reported a 6 percent drop in total earnings from movie writing, to about $343 million. TV writing nudged up, to roughly $1 billion.

headline.main: Income for Movie Writers Falls, While TV Writers’ Rises
headline.print_headline: Movie Writers’ Earnings Continue to Decline
